name: lustrous-orb
effect: Held by palkia : Holder’s dragon- and water-type moves have 1.2× their usual power.
short_effect: Boosts the damage from Palkia’s Dragon-type and Water-type moves by 20%.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves when it is held.
